name: git-command-ai
title: Git Command AI
description: Get the git command that best suits your needs and situation
author: samuel_goncalves

commands.name: prompt
commands.title: Git Command
commands.description: Ask AI what is the best git command for you

arguments.name: description
arguments.placeholder: e.g I want to stash everything, including untracked files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
